exampleEn: The conference theme is 'Innovation in Business'.
We use traditional methods of production.
Please send me a copy of the report.
Technology is changing at a fast pace.
She was assigned to the marketing department.
Your new design is similar to the old one.
exampleKo: 당신의 새 디자인은 예전 것과 유사합니다.

exampleEn: The event aims to bring together industry leaders.
exampleKo: 그 행사는 업계 리더들을 불러 모으는 것을 목표로 합니다.

exampleEn: I will certainly look into the matter.
exampleKo: 제가 확실히 그 문제를 조사해 보겠습니다.

exampleEn: We do not charge for delivery.
exampleKo: 우리는 배송에 대해 요금을 청구하지 않습니다.

exampleEn: We need to cut down on paper usage.
Have you decided on a venue for the party?
The market has remained flat for the past month.
The diamond is flawless and very valuable.
exampleKo: 그 다이아몬드는 결점이 없고 매우 가치가 있습니다.

exampleEn: Please refer to the employee handbook for more information.
exampleKo: 더 많은 정보를 원하시면 직원 안내서를참조하십시오.

exampleEn: We received a handwritten note of thanks.
exampleKo: 우리는 손으로 쓴 감사 메모를 받았습니다.

exampleEn: This phenomenon is common in the tech industry.
Sales reached a record high this quarter.
exampleKo: 이번 분기에 매출이 최고 기록을 달성했습니다.

exampleEn: Try to reset the machine if it stops working.
Please check to see if the package has arrived.
The studio announced a sequel to the popular movie.
We need to set up a date for the meeting.
We need to sharpen our competitive edge.
The two companies worked side by side on the project.
exampleKo: 두 회사는 그 프로젝트에서 나란히 일했습니다.

exampleEn: The policy applies to managers and staff alike.
exampleKo: 그 정책은 관리자와 직원 모두에게 마찬가지로 적용됩니다.

exampleEn: You should consult an accountant about your taxes.
exampleKo: 세금 문제에 대해서는 회계사와 상담해야 합니다.

exampleEn: Revenue increased; by contrast, expenses decreased.
exampleKo: 수익은 증가했습니다. 그와 대조적으로 비용은 감소했습니다.

exampleEn: The Chief Financial Officer (CFO) presented the annual report.
exampleKo: 최고 재무 책임자(CFO)가 연례 보고서를 발표했습니다.

exampleEn: We need to take corrective action immediately.
exampleKo: 우리는 즉시 시정(바로잡는) 조치를 취해야 합니다.

exampleEn: Many workers were displaced by the automation.
exampleKo: 많은 노동자들이 자동화로 인해 일자리를 잃었습니다(대신되었습니다).

exampleEn: The project is far from complete.
exampleKo: 그 프로젝트는 완료되려면 결코 멀었습니다(아직 멀었습니다).

exampleEn: The frequency of accidents has decreased.
She performed impressively during her internship.
exampleKo: 그녀는 인턴십 기간 동안 인상적으로 업무를 수행했습니다.

exampleEn: He tends to keep to himself at work.
exampleKo: 그는 직장에서 혼자 지내는(비밀로 하는) 경향이 있습니다.

exampleEn: The manager was overly critical of the report.
exampleKo: 관리자는 그 보고서에 대해 지나치게 비판적이었습니다.

exampleEn: The price is quite reasonable for this quality.
exampleKo: 이 품질에 비해 가격은 꽤 적당합니다.

exampleEn: He takes after his father in many ways.
I am unfamiliar with the new software.
The presentation will be followed by a Q&A session.
exampleKo: 발표 다음에 질의응답 시간이 있을 것입니다.

exampleEn: We faced a string of technical problems.
Please activate your account by clicking the link.
The expenses add up to a significant amount.
The annual budget has been approved.
The annual report summarizes the company's performance.
The company badly needs new investment.
exampleKo: 그 회사는 새로운 투자가 몹시(절실히) 필요합니다.

exampleEn: The building is owned by a private investment firm.
exampleKo: 그 건물은 사모 펀드 회사의 소유입니다.

exampleEn: She is well suited for the position.
The bookkeeper records all financial transactions.
The train is bound for New York.
There was an error in the calculation.
We regret the late cancellation of the event.
exampleKo: 우리는 행사의 늦은 취소를 유감스럽게 생각합니다.

exampleEn: We need to raise capital for expansion.
exampleKo: 우리는 확장을 위해 자본을 조달해야 합니다.

exampleEn: The product falls into the luxury category.
Customers can claim a refund within 30 days.
exampleKo: 고객은 30일 이내에 환불을 요구할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: The team is collectively responsible for the outcome.
exampleKo: 팀은 결과에 대해 집합적으로(총괄하여) 책임이 있습니다.

exampleEn: We combine innovation with tradition.
The software is for commercial use only.
exampleKo: 이 소프트웨어는 상업적 이용만을 위한 것입니다.

exampleEn: We have a common interest in environmental protection.
exampleKo: 우리는 환경 보호에 공동의 이익(관심사)을 가지고 있습니다.

exampleEn: Please allow time to compose a thoughtful response.
We hired a consulting firm to analyze the market.
exampleKo: 우리는 시장을 분석하기 위해 자문회사를 고용했습니다.

exampleEn: The conversion of the file format was successful.
The code consists of a four-digit number.
The monetary policy has stabilized the economy.
The initial outlay for the project was high.
Please verify the place of origin on the label.
Please send us a purchase order number.
The products are rigorously tested before shipping.
A shipping and handling fee will be added.
exampleKo: 배송 및 취급 요금이 추가될 것입니다.

exampleEn: Always unplug the device before cleaning.
exampleKo: 청소하기 전에 항상 기계의 플러그를 뽑으십시오.
